title.rendered: Value Education Workshop at Rajgad Dnyanpeeth’s Dnyanankur School

content.rendered:
Rajgad Dnyanpeeth’s Dnyanankur English Medium School, Pune, Maharashtra, invited Smile Foundation to conduct a value education session for its students. More than 350 students from classes V to X, along with their teachers participated in the two hour session. This was the first such session to be conducted in the school and the students were highly enthusiastic and responsive throughout. They requested for further sessions before giving a thunderous applause to Smile Foundationâ€™s CFC representatives.

Smile Foundation visits various privileged schools across India and conducts engaging sessions for the young minds, under CFC programme. Children are sensitized in various causes, value systems and are ushered to realize their importance in growing up as responsible citizens of the country.
